oose.thequickapp.model

Class DatabaseOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • oose.thequickapp.model.DatabaseOperations

  • public class DatabaseOperations
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    DatabaseOperations contains all of the sql queries that this app may need to interact with database;
    Author:
    Group12
